title: Farofa (Brazilian sweet chestnut stuffing)
ingredients: ['125ml olive oil', '2 apples, cored and grated', '1 large onion, minced', '3 tablespoons raisins', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '300g whole chestnuts, cooked and halved', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', 'hot sauce to taste', "300g water biscuits or cream crackers (like Jacob'sÂ®), crushed"]
